name: next-export
description: Export next.js sites to be served statically

scripts.fix-line-endings-cli: mv cli.js cli.old.js && cat cli.old.js | tr -d '' > cli.js
scripts.fix-line-endings-next-export-fix: mv next-export-fix.js next-export-fix.old.js && cat next-export-fix.old.js | tr -d '' > next-export-fix.js
scripts.v-patch: npm version patch && git push --tags && npm publish && git push
scripts.v-minor: npm version minor && git push --tags && npm publish && git push
scripts.v-major: npm version major && git push --tags && npm publish && git push

author: Tim Scanlin
